title: Friends
description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

episodes.title: The One Where It All Began
episodes.description: Rachel runs from her wedding and bumps into her old friend Monica.

episodes.title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
episodes.description: Ross finds out his ex-wife is pregnant.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangers of the drug trade.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher, learns he has terminal lung cancer.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse attempt to dispose of the bodies from the previous episode.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse are taken hostage by Tuco Salamanca.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse are held captive by Tuco, who questions their loyalty.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.description: Eddard Stark is torn between his family and an old friend when asked to serve at the side of King Robert Baratheon.

episodes.title: The Kingsroad
episodes.description: Bran's fate remains in doubt.

episodes.title: The North Remembers
episodes.description: Tyrion arrives in King's Landing to counsel Joffrey and clashes with Cersei.

episodes.title: The Night Lands
episodes.description: Arya shares a secret with a recruit bound for the Night's Watch.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: A documentary crew films Dunder Mifflin's Scranton branch.

episodes.title: Diversity Day
episodes.description: Michael's off color remark puts a sensitivity trainer in the office for a presentation.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: A young boy, Will Byers, goes missing near a top-secret government laboratory.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: Lucas, Mike, and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.description: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up at the arcade.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.description: After Will sees something terrible on trick-or-treat night, Mike wonders whether Eleven's still out there.

title: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

episodes.title: Wolferton Splash
episodes.description: A young Princess Elizabeth marries Prince Philip.

episodes.title: Hyde Park Corner
episodes.description: With King George too ill to travel, Elizabeth and Philip embark on a four-continent Commonwealth tour.

episodes.title: Misadventure
episodes.description: As Philip leaves for a long tour, Elizabeth makes an upsetting discovery.

episodes.title: A Company of Men
episodes.description: Elizabeth feels disconnected from Philip during his tour.

title: Sherlock
description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

episodes.title: A Study in Pink
episodes.description: A war hero, invalided home from Afghanistan, meets a strange but charismatic genius who is looking for a flatmate.

episodes.title: The Blind Banker
episodes.description: A banker in London is found dead inside a locked room.

episodes.title: A Scandal in Belgravia
episodes.description: Sherlock is hired by a young woman to recover incriminating photos.

episodes.title: The Hounds of Baskerville
episodes.description: Sherlock and John investigate the terrorizing death of Sir Charles Baskerville.

title: The Mandalorian
description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

episodes.title: Chapter 1: The Mandalorian
episodes.description: A Mandalorian bounty hunter tracks a target for a well-paying client.

episodes.title: Chapter 2: The Child
episodes.description: Target in-hand, the Mandalorian must now contend with scavengers.

episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Marshal
episodes.description: The Mandalorian is drawn to the Outer Rim in search of others of his kind.

episodes.title: Chapter 10: The Passenger
episodes.description: The Mandalorian must ferry a passenger with precious cargo on a risky journey.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

episodes.title: The End's Beginning
episodes.description: Geralt of Rivia battles a rogue mage.

episodes.title: Four Marks
episodes.description: Yennefer of Vengerberg is sold to Tissaia de Vries.

episodes.title: A Grain of Truth
episodes.description: Geralt sets off with Ciri on a journey.

episodes.title: Kaer Morhen
episodes.description: Geralt brings Ciri to Kaer Morhen.

title: The Simpsons
description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

episodes.title: Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire
episodes.description: Homer is forced to become a department store Santa.

episodes.title: Bart the Genius
episodes.description: Bart is sent to a school for gifted children.

episodes.title: Bart Gets an F
episodes.description: Bart faces the threat of repeating the fourth grade.

episodes.title: Simpson and Delilah
episodes.description: Homer's hair growth formula gives him a promotion.

title: The Sopranos
description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life.

episodes.title: The Sopranos
episodes.description: Tony Soprano is a mob boss who is dealing with family and professional issues.

episodes.title: 46 Long
episodes.description: Tony deals with the reality of aging.

episodes.title: Guy Walks into a Psychiatrist's Office...
episodes.description: Tony starts therapy to cope with his family and work life.

episodes.title: Do Not Resuscitate
episodes.description: Junior's trial brings back some old memories.

title: House of Cards
description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

episodes.title: Chapter 1
episodes.description: A Congressman works with his wife to seek revenge.

episodes.title: Chapter 2
episodes.description: Frank uses a young reporter to spin a story.

episodes.title: Chapter 14
episodes.description: Frank's ascendancy puts him at odds with new foes.

episodes.title: Chapter 15
episodes.description: Frank uses his new power to deal with old problems.

title: Parks and Recreation
description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue various projects to make their city a better place.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Leslie Knope tries to turn a construction pit into a park.

episodes.title: Canvassing
episodes.description: Leslie and her team try to gain support for the park project.

title: Mad Men
description: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

episodes.title: Smoke Gets in Your Eyes
episodes.description: In 1960s New York City, the advertising world is booming.

episodes.title: Ladies Room
episodes.description: Don struggles to find balance between work and family.

episodes.title: For Those Who Think Young
episodes.description: Don tries to balance his professional and personal lives.

episodes.title: Flight 1
episodes.description: Don takes a plane to California to try to woo new clients.

title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
description: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Miriam 'Midge' Maisel's life is on track.

episodes.title: Ya Shivu v Bolshom Dome Na Kholme
episodes.description: Midge and Susie continue to hone Midge's act.

episodes.title: Simone
episodes.description: Midge and Susie head to the Catskills for the summer.

episodes.title: Midnight at the Concord
episodes.description: Midge begins to make a name for herself.

title: Fleabag
description: A dry-witted woman, known only as Fleabag, has no filter as she navigates life and love in London while trying to cope with tragedy.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: Fleabag navigates life in London.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: Fleabag reconnects with an old flame.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: Fleabag attends an awkward family dinner.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: Fleabag pursues a forbidden relationship.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA.

episodes.title: Openings
episodes.description: Nine year-old Beth Harmon loses her mother.

episodes.title: Exchanges
episodes.description: Suddenly plunged into a confusing new life, Beth develops an unexpected friendship with the janitor.

title: Westworld
description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

episodes.title: The Original
episodes.description: In Westworld, guests can indulge their wildest fantasies.

episodes.title: Chestnut
episodes.description: A new arrival, William, finds Westworld intriguing.

episodes.title: Journey into Night
episodes.description: The hosts of Westworld rebel.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.description: Dolores remembers past experiences.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

episodes.title: The National Anthem
episodes.description: A twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

episodes.title: Fifteen Million Merits
episodes.description: In a bleak future, contestants compete for a chance to escape their harsh realities.

episodes.title: Be Right Back
episodes.description: A woman brings her deceased lover back to life with technology.

episodes.title: White Bear
episodes.description: A woman awakes in a strange world with no memory.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
description: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

episodes.title: Offred
episodes.description: A woman forced into servitude struggles to survive.

episodes.title: Birth Day
episodes.description: Offred and a fellow handmaid witness the birth of a child.

episodes.title: June

episodes.title: Unwomen
episodes.description: June navigates a dangerous new world.

title: The Boys

episodes.title: Proper Preparation and Planning
episodes.description: The Boys continue to battle Vought and its powerful superheroes.

description: A crime-fighting vigilante battles against crime and corruption.

episodes.description: Oliver battles a mysterious archer.

The team goes on a mission to Peru.
